## PolicyLoaderOptions.activateOnLoad property

Whether to activate updated policy bundles as soon as they are downloaded.

**Signature:**

```typescript
activateOnLoad?: boolean;
```

## Remarks

If `false`<!-- -->, new bundles will be downloaded automatically but not used to evaluate policy decisions until you call [`PolicyLoader.activate()`](./embedded-client.policyloader.activate.md)<!-- -->. This might be useful if you want to activate updates only on page transitions to avoid layout shifts in your application.
